member.name: T:Robbiblubber.Util.Library.Coding.AES
member.summary: This class provides an AES implementation that is more likely to work properly in cross-platform scenarios.
member.remarks: I have used Joseph Ssenyange's sample code found here: http://zenu.wordpress.com/2011/09/21/aes-128bit-cross-platform-java-and-c-encryption-compatibility/ Thanks a lot!
